Class TaskClient

extends Client
    Client for interacting with tasks on engine
    Author:
    Felix Chapman, alexandraorth

        public static TaskClient of(String host,

      • sendTask

        public TaskId sendTask(Class<?> taskClass,
                       String creator,
                       Instant runAt,
                       Duration interval,
                       mjson.Json configuration)
        Submit a task to run on an Grakn Engine server
        Parameters:
        taskClass - Class of the Task to run
        creator - Class creating the task
        runAt - Time at which the task should be executed
        interval - Interval at which the task should recur, can be null
        configuration - Data on which to execute the task
        Returns:
        Identifier of the submitted task that will be executed on a server

      • getStatus

        public TaskStatus getStatus(TaskId id)
        Get the status of a given task on the server
        Parameters:
        id - Identifier of the task to get status of
        Returns:
        Status of the specified task
        Throws:
        EngineStorageException - When the specified task has not yet been stored by the server

      • stopTask

        public boolean stopTask(TaskId id)
        Stop a task using the given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the task to stop
